home.title: Basit Ali
home.subtitle: Frontend-focused Fullstack JavaScript Developer
home.intro: A passionate developer with 6+ years of experience creating scalable, reliable applications.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Frontend-focused Fullstack JavaScript Developer with 6+ years of experience creating scalable, reliable applications using JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, and related ecosystems. Adept at bridging design and engineering teams, I deliver solutions aligned with best practices like TDD, DRY, KISS, and SOLID principles. Skilled in building user-centric applications and optimizing development workflows for maximum efficiency.

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.achievements: I earned a degree with a 3.89 CGPA, and was honored as the Gold Medalist of my batch. Throughout my studies, I gained proficiency in several programming languages.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A collection of projects I've worked on throughout my career. Each project represents a unique challenge and solution.
projects.project1Description: A premier financial intelligence platform providing financial data and analytics.
projects.project2Description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform for healthcare products providing a seamless shopping experience.
projects.project3Description: A real-time dashboard displaying SIM activation data through dynamic tables and interactive map plotting.
projects.project4Description: A centralized portal for telecom data management including balance, recharge history, and commissions.
projects.project5Description: A fintech trading platform featuring real-time data visualization, WebSockets, and machine learning integrations.
projects.project6Description: A healthcare platform using AI for medical image analysis with deep learning models and HIPAA-compliant data handling.
projects.project7Description: An innovative virtual reality education platform with immersive 3D environments and real-time collaboration.
projects.project8Description: A blockchain-based supply chain tracking system with smart contracts and IoT integration.
projects.project9Description: A scalable video streaming platform with adaptive bitrate streaming and content recommendation.
projects.project10Description: An IoT-based smart home management system with energy optimization algorithms and voice command interface.
